parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the list of triggers synchronized with a given waypoint.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''synchronizedTriggers''' waypoint

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[synchronizedTriggers]] _someWaypoint;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[synchronizeObjectsAdd]], [[synchronizeObjectsRemove]], [[synchronizedWaypoints]]
</value></part></template>
